lenders.name: Jason

lenders.occupational_info: Marketing that helps businesses grow.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I believe that those of us in the developed world need to make helping the rest our priority.  I don't have a lot in comparison to my neighbors, but I have enough to lend.
lenders.occupational_info: Our business takes audio recordings of interviews and meetings and types them into the computer for research or archiving.

lenders.name: Austin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I look after web and mail servers for a large university. I'm in the Territorial Army - the UK Army reserve.

lenders.name: Lori

lenders.name: Susanna O!

lenders.loan_because: Peace and change begins with each of us.

lenders.occupational_info: i am 7 3/4

lenders.name: Rev. Kelly

lenders.name: Marz and Susanne

lenders.occupational_info: Our job is enjoyable and interesting.  We work with artist/entertainers who are passionate about what they do.  That's why we want to help people to live their dreams; seeking to calm their desire for more.

lenders.name: Pierre
lenders.loan_because: Hell, I got that bit of money on the bank account doing nothing, so it might as well help people that need it and have ideas rather than just profit my greedy banker. :)
lenders.occupational_info: behind the desk developing websites, sort of, waiting for the next opportunity to travel the world, meet new people, do a bit of good around me.

lenders.name: Pradeep
lenders.loan_because: I understand the nature and need of borrowers and I have been in there shoes several times in my life but was helpless.Ever since I heard about Kiva, I think it's a way to help the community.I will do my best in my will to give community any help I can afford.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I believe in every person's vision for themselves and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: Design models and implants to aid in patient specfic (custom) surgical procedures.

lenders.name: Per Kristian
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help the entrepreneurs build a sustainable income that can make their life better and help their local community thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a programmer and develope mainly web based software solutions, like websites, portals and webshops.

lenders.name: Abhilash
lenders.loan_because: I love people who sweat and toil to earn their bread, instead of beg, in spite of severe hardships and poverty. And I wish to empower such people. With the dream that they, in turn, empower more people to work for their living.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineer and an oilman. I travel around the world and wish to contribute my tiny bit to the society wherever I go. Meanwhile, I spend some time encouraging social activism in my country, India.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: as a current graduate student getting my degree in the field of social work I feel a responsibility to help others in need. I believe in a Creator who gives us second chances...he's given me many more. Why not give to others the mercy and grace He's shown me.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy and feels so good.  Also and obviously, because I want to help others who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: My work currently involves simply living as an environmentally sensitive life as I can.  I am also working to uncomplicate my life, but that is difficult given my fascination with technology.

lenders.name: Roy Neil
lenders.loan_because: the Kiva program seems to be a way to link up with others around the world who enjoy work and want to live useful, productive lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college writing and literature classes on a campus that is part of the state university system. I also write and publish papers, mostly on literary topics.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It's a good idea.
lenders.occupational_info: Like the movie Office Space.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I am a citizen of the world and it is my job to help a citizen in need, wherever they are.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the first manager of sustainability for Iron Moutain. I get to spend every day thinking about how my company can meet its business goals while also doing great things for our community and the environment!

lenders.name: Kristi-lee Gordon
lenders.loan_because: There are people in this world who need financial assistance more then I do. I have been fortunate in my life to be blessed with a safe home and a healthy family, and by loaning money to these people, I hope they can have a wonderful life as well.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I think everybody who has enough money should give at least a little bit to the poorer people in the world.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.occupational_info: I am part of an organisation that purchases and improves commerical and residential property throughout Europe by co-investing alongside local real estate companies.

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because:
I can.
I am thankful that I was born here and have all these opportunities so many people don't have. 
Our world is getting smaller by the day and I am happy to be able to help others who are less fortunate. 
I also strongly admire all entrepreneurs who work hard to make a living. 
Plus I hope the loans are some motivation, I know it would motivate me, if someone from across the world believed in me :-)
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in administration at a home for old people. 
I try to make everything run smoothly for the old people and their relatives. I like my work and my colleagues.

lenders.name: Kelsey
lenders.loan_because: I love seeing people reach their full potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell advertising space on popular American websites (one being Better Homes & Gardens, BHG.com).

lenders.name: Susan

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Office of Diversity at a community college in Kansas.

lenders.name: Kayla
lenders.loan_because: It helps others get the footing they need to succeed.

lenders.name: ross
lenders.loan_because: To share, help, and knit the world into a better place for everyone
lenders.occupational_info: I start up companies, then manage and grow them, then move on to a next venture.

lenders.name: bendid
lenders.loan_because: I feel that Kiva and its field partner really enable and empower people to take life into their own hands in economic terms.
lenders.occupational_info: Since I work in bank myself, I feel that  access to capital for the right price is absolutely necessary for economic progress and activity. Transaction cost and institutional constrains make it difficult for large financial institutions to make micro loans. Hence, an organization like Kiva and its field partner are an important and revolutionary capital allocation and transmission link!

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: A modest amount (in our society) of financial  help can make a big difference to someone in another (less privileged) society.
lenders.occupational_info: Designing industrial printers.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: a little bit goes a long way!
lenders.occupational_info: I help other people take care of their money.

lenders.name: Hugo
lenders.loan_because: I find it truly amazing that the simple act of giving can provide poor people with optimistic plans for the future and help households cope with everyday life.

lenders.name: Ranjani
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to encourage and empower  individuals who are willing to work hard in persuit of their dreams.

lenders.name: katie
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to live  a decent life

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I load because I can. My parents were born in Poland under communism and though we have all three grown up as studied, thoughtful, educated people, I am the one that has comparatively huge financial resources to share. I simply owe to others that which is not my wealth, but rather my good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the education field, but not directly in the classroom. There are teachers of children, there are principals who organize and support a whole school of teachers, and there are superintendents who give help and information to schools. My work is in research, helping these educators, mostly principals and superintendents, to make decisions with information about how students learn, and what types of programs work well for as many as 100,000 students at a time.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I have personally recognized that I am blessed more than I am worth. The only thing that makes me happy is giving in all the ways I can, in all the time I can, and as often as I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student who's personal goal in life is success for others. How that comes about I'm still in the process of figuring out.

lenders.name: eric
lenders.loan_because:
It encourages financial independence through entrepreneurship. As pointed by another lender, Kiva is not just another charity. On top of the money, it delivers development planning, organizational and financial advices and best of all it gives dignity to the borrowers who can say at the end: I DID IT.

On the personal side, it's good to think you did something useful...without that much of an effort. Congratulations to the Kiva teams for this excellent initiative.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing that I CAN make a difference in the lives of others. What a great idea!!!

lenders.name: The Davis Family

lenders.name: christina
lenders.occupation: retail + event manager for a non-profit
lenders.loan_because: The thought of being able to help people change their lives makes me shiver.
lenders.occupational_info:
I manage a retail store that supports a non-profit writing lab. 826LA is a non-profit organization dedicated to supporting students ages 6 to 18 with their creative and expository writing skills, and to helping teachers inspire their students to write.

Our services are structured around our belief that great leaps in learning can happen with one-on-one attention, and that strong writing skills are fundamental to future success.

With this in mind, we provide drop-in tutoring, after-school workshops, in-schools tutoring, help for English language learners, and assistance with student publications.

All of our programs are challenging and enjoyable, and ultimately strengthen each student’s power to express ideas effectively, creatively, confidently, and in his or her individual voice.

lenders.loan_because: I believe the best way to help someone is to empower them.

lenders.name: KRIS
lenders.loan_because: I am in a very fortunate position in my life at 45 yrs old, married for 1 year with a 13 yr old son, I can afford to loan monies to deserving entrepreneurs, I used to be one myself many years ago.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an investment company looking after around 12 offices on a flexible basis.  I also have a travel design company, arranging unusual special interest travel throughout the world.

lenders.name: Gayle
lenders.loan_because: I am so grateful that Kiva exists to connect people worldwide and allow me to participate in helping others as I have been helped.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I like to give people encouragement and the resources to succeed in their lives.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us with so much!
lenders.occupational_info: I watch our three children, clean our house, and cook.

lenders.name: Jean-Marie
lenders.loan_because: J'aime me sentir utile.
lenders.occupational_info: J'enseigne les sciences à des jeunes de 18 à 20 ans.

lenders.name: Astrid
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: It's not about me, it's about us......

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and know that a small amount of capital can make a big difference in growing a business.  I believe that energy you put out comes back to you.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell incense supplies and children's clothing on the Internet and in craft shows.

lenders.name: Alyssa
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help people. Somebody once told me that you won't get anywhere in life if you don't help other people get where they want in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going to school to be a doctor and one day would like to help other countries who need medical help.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I was very fortunate to learn at a young age that true fulfillment does not come from what you have or what you accumulate but instead it comes from what you give back and contribute to the world that has put us where we are. Too often we hurry and rush to get somewhere only to realize we never actually 'get there'. If we always tell our selves we will give back once we 'get there' then it will be too late.
lenders.occupational_info:
I search out ways to teach, help and improve people. This is through reading, writing, speaking and mentoring, among other things. Often the most can be taught and learned through genuine friendship. 

I also seek out the best and most productive businesses in which to invest money so that money can grow to allow me to further contribute.

lenders.name: Ivette
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the wealth and support women around the world. I usually sponser single women with children in Spanish speaking countries.

lenders.name: Arlen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who work hard and want to run their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: The company I own uses computer controlled machines called WEDM (wire electric discharge machines) to precisely make or modify metal components from raw material stock, such as round bars, square and rectangular bars, sheet and plate.

lenders.name: Ruthe
lenders.loan_because: it's our human connection with other people on planet earth.  We share the world and this is right sharing of resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to someone's story and health concerns and match their symptoms to an energetic remedy made from a plant, animal or mineral.

lenders.name: Timur & Co
lenders.loan_because:
http://www.uVme.biz/444714IK
http://www.uVme.com/uVmGuest/signup/444714IK 
http://www.uVmeRUS.blog.ru/profile

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is a wonderful cause. I love that people all over the world now have an opportunity to start, save or improve their business.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school to study community and regional development. My emphasis is social services and environmental policy and planning.

lenders.name: Carrie Sue
lenders.loan_because: Those who have, should help those who need.
lenders.occupational_info: I play with plants

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: From little things, big things grow...

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it sometimes just takes one hand to lift someone up, but when people work together miracles happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an aspiring Chef in the San Diego(CA, USA) area.

lenders.name: Graham
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Hoang
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate to have everything that I have in my life, especially my husband.

lenders.name: Lyn
lenders.loan_because: I believe our resources should be shared with those less fortunate. By lending through kiva I know the money is going to the people I want it to and is not chewed up in admin costs & charges and the repaid money can be lent out again and again
lenders.occupational_info: I work for my self as a tax and business services accountant.

lenders.name: Web Success Agency
lenders.loan_because: We can make a real difference.
lenders.occupational_info: We develop websites for select industries.

lenders.name: Cathianne
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Tourism, also E-Bay store "GreyDogSaves"

lenders.name: Vital Imagery Ltd.
lenders.loan_because: Since we started our business in 2006 we have been looking for a way to 'give back'. We found this organization and thought this would be the perfect way to help make a difference. :)
lenders.occupational_info: Our company offers online access to clipart, photos, etc. by subscription. We are donating 10c from every subscription we sell to this program.

lenders.name: MATT & WENDY
lenders.loan_because: WE WANT OTHERS TO GROW AS OUR NEW MARRIAGE GROWS.

lenders.name: Eric T.
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others with their endeavours and make a difference in their lives.

lenders.name: angela
lenders.loan_because: I was given a kiva gift certificate as a gift.  I loan because it is a good feeling to help others.

lenders.name: Scott Paterson
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate to be successfully self-employed myself and am happy to be able to support others in the larger world in that endeavor too.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm the webmaster for http://Saabnet.com, a resource for Saab car owners that I created on the Internet in 1988. I'm also the founder of the non-profit organization called http://Poverty2Prosperity.org
Please join me on Lending Team P2P! http://www.kiva.org/team/poverty2prosperity

lenders.name: The Osborne Family
lenders.loan_because: this is a win - win situation. My family and I want to make a positive change in our world, and we believe this is just the beginning. This is the system of pay-it-forward and while we help one person they continue to help themselves and others.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to take charge of their lives and make changes for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach the little ones how to read and try to show them what an amazing world this place is.

lenders.name: Gerard
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their dreams and obtain financial freedom
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies buy and sell other companies

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I am a herb farmer..the earth is good to me..if I am good to other farmers and they are good to the earth then the earth can be good to us all..
lenders.occupational_info: medicinal herb farmer

lenders.name: Guy
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and sometimes I forget how blessed I am.  This also allows someone else to have the same opportunities that I was given.

lenders.name: Jazmine
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is great, I get to deal with people everyday, and get to know each member individually. :)

lenders.name: Heike
lenders.loan_because: I want to give poorer people the chance to manage their life and have a good income
lenders.occupational_info: we have a small farm, holiday appartement, some animals...and -not to forget- two daughters!

lenders.name: Scooter
lenders.loan_because: I eat better than most people. That's why I give. Just call it canine karma.
lenders.occupational_info: Very Creative.

lenders.name: Caitlin Russell
lenders.loan_because: I'm human and i can.
lenders.occupational_info: i dont really 'work', not for money. my partner earns the money, i look after the children, house, chickens, fish tank and gardens. and build robots to take over the world in a shed in the garden. only some of that is true.

lenders.name: Jennie
lenders.loan_because: I hope that it can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange finance for people who want to buy a house

lenders.name: Katrin
lenders.loan_because: Kivas idea to help people is brilliant. I hope to empower people to improve their lifes with my loan in a small way.

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because: Even a little step is important.

lenders.name: Johan
lenders.loan_because: I want to put money where they can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I make machines talk, sing and sound.

lenders.name: Bill Luton
lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs in developing countries realize some of the same dreams that are within reach for every American.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college students in several universities, from the undergraduate level to MBA level.

lenders.name: yotam
lenders.loan_because:
I appreciate this system of development and hope that it becomes more widespread.
By loaning I encourage other people to loan.
lenders.occupational_info: I work mostly in front of a computer. My time is spent in thinking about answers to problems.

lenders.name: Kandi
lenders.loan_because: "Give a man a fish...."
lenders.occupational_info: I sing in a musical band.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in community funding of individuals who are working towards a better outcome for themselves and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on large financial transactions and I teach legal studies to adults.

lenders.name: Imelda
lenders.loan_because: speaking of experience  I know how it is when one is badly  in need of any kind of urgent help.
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly Iám happy and contented, thanks  ABOVE

lenders.name: ilia
lenders.loan_because: unlike charity, loans may give a break to a hardworking and the most deserving people.
lenders.occupational_info: design silicon for efficient solar,  wind and other electrical power conversion.

lenders.name: Shadi G
lenders.loan_because: "Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege"

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: it's the least i could do
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a disease eradication program

lenders.name: Eniola
lenders.loan_because: I'm 27 years old from Lagos state, Nigeria, I have 2 children. I loan because, I want to expand my business, I want to be buying beads accessories in large quantity and be selling it at a considerate price.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm into beads making, I also trained entrepreneurs on how to make beads of difference styles and design.

lenders.name: Jose Vicente
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I'm thankful for my life and wish to spread it to someone who might be less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm some one who helps to develop our material world.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I have worked hard all my life to achieve what I have and am happy to encourage others to do the same
lenders.occupational_info: I own a cookware importing business and sell and demonstrate cookware at exhibitions across Australia.  I also appear at live shows and on television showing people how to cook and promoting cooking related products.

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea to help people who are not as well situated as myself but without stealing them their dignity.

lenders.name: Ines
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I have been given several opportunities in my life from others to promote my own health and well-being. I know without these gracious people who have touched my life, I would not be where I am today. I just want to give back what was so freely given to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a graduate student.

lenders.name: Evan J Thor
lenders.loan_because: I am very interested in the growth of the world's developing nations
lenders.occupational_info: Working at Research in Motion and am very interested in international relations, environmental policy and sustainable business practices.

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: What a great way to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I investigate deaths.

lenders.name: Daniela
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves.

lenders.name: Mette
lenders.loan_because: Its a very good way of helping people around the globe to empowerment
lenders.occupational_info: Manager

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: It helps ease the burden.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: It warms the cockles of my heart.

lenders.name: Bianca
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Khalid
lenders.loan_because:
I heard about Kiva at an international health conference and absolutely fell in love with the idea of micro loans.
This is great!
lenders.occupational_info: I study diseases!

lenders.name: Shawna
lenders.loan_because: We all deserve to eat

lenders.name: Silke
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the life I live and I want to support someone else who is not so blessed and I think this is a fantastic concept!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for my own family-company; we have a wholesale trade for american patchwork fabrics.

lenders.name: Tess
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I have more than I need and so many opportunities.  I want to share that with others and help them create their own opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students a second language, an empathy for others around the world, and as much cultural understanding as anyone can gain until they travel abroad.

lenders.name: Gabriela
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful opportunity to help people all over the world make their (business) dream come true by giving them the only thing which is missing - money.

lenders.name: Ziad Iskandar
lenders.loan_because: The idea of empowering people to help themselves is effective and brings out the best in people.

lenders.name: robert luciano
lenders.loan_because: As a kid growing up I expience poverty and hunger first hand and I consider myself fortunate to have been able to move forward.
lenders.occupational_info: As a graphic designer I design advertising and promotional materials, poster, displays etc. that help my clients sell their products.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.whereabouts: San Pedro Garza Garcia Nuevo Leon
lenders.loan_because: I think those of us that have been blessed by our Lord have a moral obligation to help other less fortunate. I chose Kiva because it provides a way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the most precious resource any country can have, its children. With a proper education a people can raise their standard of living almost without limit, I´m glad I can help my country in such a way.

lenders.name: Judi & Jeff
lenders.loan_because: We want to feel connected to the world.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: When I had little more than a good idea and a plan, others loaned to me. By loaning to those in need, I am honoring those who loaned to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and build the systems that your ISP uses to provide you with internet access.

lenders.name: Guenther
lenders.loan_because: These microcredits are a good way to help others to help themselves. I believe the direct way is the most effective one.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a heart clinic together with colleagues from all over the world.

lenders.name: Boja
lenders.loan_because: ... to share with less fortunate

lenders.name: Los Gatos Kiva Fund
lenders.loan_because: We loan becasue we believe in this project.
lenders.occupational_info: We are all form different work and educational backgrounds.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: it's important to help where you can...

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kathy in California
lenders.occupational_info: I play Irish/Scottish folk music around the world.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: "Credit: Man’s Confidence in Man" ~ John Moody

lenders.name: KIVA HS Osnabrueck
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves to be self sufficient
lenders.occupational_info:
We would like to show friends of ours, how easy it is to support entrepreneurs from all over the world, especially those from under developed countries. We ask our friends and fellow students for a donation of one cent or a small donation of less than 1 Euro, which we collect and transfer it to our Kiva account.

The HS-Osnabrueck Students

lenders.name: Too Cool Girlies
lenders.loan_because: It helps people and we like that!
lenders.occupational_info: We are students and we do chores around our house to earn money to lend to others and buy ice cream!

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I have to do something personal to help alleviate suffering in the world. The ability to have a direct relationship with the recipients allows me to know people in very different cultures from my own and makes it harder to thin of anyone as "them."
lenders.occupational_info: In addition to maintaining a private psychology practice I teach workshops on yoga, meditation and spiritual practice in many different countries.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: non-profit sports organization

lenders.name: Dawn & Tim
lenders.loan_because: We love that we can help those that are not in the fortunate position that we are here in the West, but deserve to have the same opportunities and power over their own destiny and lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people to find and know their BLISS in this life.

lenders.name: Dumdum
lenders.loan_because: It is interesting to see people in a very different country doing similar businesses but in a vastly different setting.
lenders.occupational_info: Wine and cheese, coffee and chocolate... life is good!

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to show compassion and to make a concrete difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach a variety of courses in communication and film.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference on a global level rather than just a local one - plus it's very addictive!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange home loans to help people buy property

lenders.name: OBrien Family
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we believe that those who can help have an ethical obligation to do so.  If we can give, we must give.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both licensed social workers and  work as therapists.  We are proud parents of two middle schoolers who help us pick our entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Karyn
lenders.loan_because: I live in a very lucky country and have everything and more and these people have so little...wanting to share in some small way
lenders.occupational_info: I live and work in a holiday resort.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: we are teaching our children about helping others, and how even a small amount of money can make an impact in people's lives.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: "it's better to teach someone to fish - than to give them a fish", so assisting people to kick-start their lives is a great idea.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: I believe microlending is the best way to alleviate global poverty and I am eager to see firsthand the impact a small loan can make on the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm going to graduate school for international affairs and would like to work in microfinance afterwards.

lenders.name: Edith
lenders.loan_because: I feel very blessed  to have my family and friends and to live in America. If I can help even one person in a small way by donating then maybe it can lead to others who in turn may help someone else because of the chance they were given.
